illandril-token-hud-scale.setting.effect: Adjusts the scale of Effect icons so that this many icons appear per row of icons (as shown on the token).
illandril-token-hud-scale.setting.enable: Increases the size of the Token HUD Buttons (Toggle Visibility, Assign Status Effects, Toggle Combat State, etc) by approximately 2x.
Increases the size of the Status Effect icons shown under the Assign Status Effects button to match the size of the other Token HUD Buttons.
illandril-token-hud-scale.setting.darken: Reduces the opacity of the Token HUD button background color to improve contrast.
